name: ParameterChecker_checkOneOfParametersRequiredTest
description: Unit tests for the ParameterChecker.checkOneOfParametersRequired method, which validates that at least one of the specified parameters is present in the provided JSONObject.

test_cases.name: testCheckOneOfParametersRequired_AllParametersMissing
test_cases.description: Tests that a BinanceConnectorException is thrown when none of the specified parameters are present in the JSONObject.

test_cases.name: testCheckOneOfParametersRequired_OneParameterPresent
test_cases.description: Tests that no exception is thrown when at least one of the specified parameters is present in the JSONObject.

test_cases.name: testCheckOneOfParametersRequired_NullParams
test_cases.description: Tests that a BinanceConnectorException is thrown when the provided JSONObject is null.

test_cases.name: testCheckOneOfParametersRequired_AllParametersPresent
test_cases.description: Tests that no exception is thrown when all of the specified parameters are present in the JSONObject.
